thread.title: Abbey Clancy left upset over her BRIT Awards dress as she accuses stylist of 'making a fool of her' at the Warner afterparty
thread.title_full: Abbey Clancy left upset over her BRIT Awards dress as she accuses stylist of 'making a fool of her' at the Warner afterparty

title: Abbey Clancy left upset over her BRIT Awards dress as she accuses stylist of 'making a fool of her' at the Warner afterparty
text:
TV Magazine 'THIS DRESS IS S***!' Abbey Clancy left upset over her BRIT Awards dress as she accuses stylist of ‘making a fool of her’ at the Warner afterparty 
The model didn't hold back as she told friend her true feelings about the dress Exclusive BY LAUREN FRANKLIN, SHOWBIZ REPORTER AND NOLA OJOMU, SHOWBIZ REPORTER 23rd February 2017, 1:33 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ABBEY Clancy revealed she hated her striking dress the BRIT awards as she told friends her stylist had made “a fool” out of her. 
The stunning mode l was heard telling friends at the Warner Music and Ciroc afterparty how much she hated the “s***” dress, before admitting her husband Peter Crouch also wasn’t a fan of the ensemble. Fame Flynet 8 Abbey Clancy revealed she hated her striking dress the BRIT awards 
Abbey had posed up a storm on the night as she hit the red carpet in her striking one-shoulder deconstructed tuxedo dress by Haider Ackerman. 
The black and white striped dress had been styled with a thick waist belt and she appeared to be wearing a black vest top underneath. 
She highlighted her model legs with black heeled sandals but as the night went on it Abbey become more and more frustrated with the outfit. 
Abbey was heard moaning to her friends in the ladies room as she branded the dress as a “s***” option for her stylist to have given her. Fame Flynet The stunning model was heard telling friends at the Warner Music and Ciroc afterparty how much she hated the “s***” dress Reuters Abbey had posed up a storm on the night as she hit the red carpet in her striking one-shoulder deconstructed tuxedo dress Fame Flynet But Abbey was heard moaning to her friends in the ladies room as she branded the dress as a “s***” option for her stylist to have given her RELATED ARTICLES SHOP TALK Shopaholic family with THREE sets of twins reveals £12,000 shoe collection on tonight's Shop Well For Less Real housewives of the mob Trevor McDonald meets daughter of hitman who's believed to have murdered 100 people 'IS SHE PREGNANT?' Charlotte Crosby sparks pregnancy rumours amongst her fans after cradling her stomach TMI LOVE LETTER Stephen Bear shares love note 'from Charlotte Crosby' praising his 'perfect penis and noodle hair' MUSICAL MAGIC When is Let's Sing and Dance for Comic Relief on BBC1, who's in the line-up and who are the presenters? NEW SHERIFF IN TOWN Here's what we know about new Death in Paradise star Ardal O’Hanlon SHOUT OUT TO MY OX Perrie Edwards tries not to flash EVERYTHING as her boyfriend helps her into car after BRIT Awards HORROR SHOW Union J's Josh Cuthbert, JJ Hamblett and Jaymi Hensley compete in Release the Hounds tonight 'He's still got it!' This Morning viewers swoon over hunky Marti Pellow as they declare he looks better than ever at 51 LET'S TALK ABOUT SEX Celebrity Sex Pod is set to expose the sex lives of the stars - all you need to know BFF REUNION Coleen Nolan is reunited with James Cosmo for the first time since Celebrity Big Brother on Loose Women BRIGHT AND EARLY Jade Thirlwall and Jesy Nelson go make-up free as they fly out of London the morning after BRIT Awards 
The star backed up her thoughts by admitting that her footballer husband didn’t like the striped dress. 
One reason Abbey might have been so upset with her outfit could be the unfortunate wardrobe malfunction she suffered earlier in the night. 
Abbey was left pulling her dress down as her rising hemline left her pants on display. 
The Britain’s Next Top Model host was left red-faced when she accidentally showed off her pants. MagicmomentsUK The star also admitted that her footballer husband Peter Crouch (left) didn’t like the dress either Xposure Abbey appeared to become camera shy at the end of the night PA:Press Association Abbey Clancy accidentally showed off her black pants on the red carpet PA:Press Association 8 She was seen attempting to pull her mini-dress down 
Abbey braved the strong winds and was forced to hold her skirt in place as she headed to her waiting car. 
The former Strictly champ looked all partied out as she snuggled up to hubby Peter Crouch in the back of a taxi..
